00033 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00034 {
00035   createinfo(argc, argv);
00036   
00037   if (argc < 2) {
00038     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s slaterdetfile\n", argv[0]);
00039     exit(-1);
00040   }
00041   
00042   char* slaterdetfile = argv[optind];
00043 
00044   SlaterDet Q;
00045   readSlaterDetfromFile(&Q, slaterdetfile);
00046 
00047   SlaterDetAux X;
00048   initSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00049   calcSlaterDetAux(&Q, &X);
00050 
00051   double r2, pr2, nr2, ed2, q2, pq2, nq2, o2, po2, no2, nosci, pnosci, nnosci;
00052   double s2, ps2, ns2, t2, pt2, nt2;

00056   calcConstraintNR2(&Q, &X, &nr2);
00057

00065   calcConstraintEO2(&Q, &X, &po2);
00066   calcConstraintNO2(&Q, &X, &no2);
00067

00069   calcConstraintPNOsci(&Q, &X, &pnosci);
00070   calcConstraintNNOsci(&Q, &X, &nnosci);

00072   calcConstraintS2(&Q, &X, &s2);
00073   calcConstraintPS2(&Q, &X, &ps2);
00074   calcConstraintNS2(&Q, &X, &ns2);
00075 
00076   calcConstraintT2(&Q, &X, &t2);
00077   calcConstraintPT2(&Q, &X, &pt2);
00078   calcConstraintNT2(&Q, &X, &nt2);
00079

00081   fprintf(stdout, "                   ED2:   %8.3f\n", ed2);
00082   fprintf(stdout, "Q2:    %8.3f    PQ2:   %8.3f    NQ2:   %8.3f\n", q2, pq2, nq2);
